Html:
Hi Jonathan,
   I download test.cs file from Issue "Infinite loop in HoffmanPavleyRankedShortestPathAlgorithm",  and when the ShortestPathCount=5 or >1 , the compute process still seems be infinite.  My version is latest version of .net 2.0. Could you help me find the problem?

Did you build from sources?

From: daliwei001

build from source?  I just imported  the dll reference, and copied the code to the program.cs  in my console test application. I dont understand the meaning of "building from source"?

The release binaries are out of date.
